page.title: 10MY FAMILY'S LEISURE TIME
page.content:
My mum spends her spare time working in the garden to make it nice to sit out in during the summer. My dad's spare time is spent sitting in an armchair reading a newspaper, cleaning the car or caravan, or helping in the garden. My brother, David 13, plays football in the park or goes on a bicycle ride to{Ormskirk}about 6 miles away, to visit a friend. My other brother, Seth 9, plays snooker on his snooker table or at a local club. My sister, Jane 4, plays in the garden with her dolls, teddy bear, or on the swing or slide. I play football in the park with my brother. I am in the school football team and we won medals in the local league this year.
Dean Ford aged 11.
